newsitem.title: USA: Abraxas stock seen undervalued - report.
newsitem.headline: Abraxas stock seen undervalued - report.

text.p: Shares in Abraxas Petroleum Corp are seen as undervalued, according to a report in Business Week.
According to the magazine, Jefferies & Co analyst C. Van Levy said Abraxas' net asset value is $13.50 a share and that the stock is currently trading at 57 percent of its liquidation value.
Abraxas stock closed at unchanged at $7.00 on Thursday.
